lead_paragraph: The Nets announced that they had signed Jerry Stackhouse, a 17-year N.B.A. veteran, and Mirza Teletovic, a 26-year-old free-agent forward who played in Spain last season.
snippet: The Nets announced that they had signed Jerry Stackhouse, a 17-year N.B.A. veteran, and Mirza Teletovic, a 26-year-old free-agent forward who played in Spain last season.
